price: Wͻyεε wͻn Wura Nyankopͻn Asomafoͻ no asεm ho asoͻden, enti Ͻde asotwee a emu yε den twee wͻn aso.
arabic: فَعَصَوۡاْ رَسُولَ رَبِّهِمۡ فَأَخَذَهُمۡ أَخۡذَةٗ رَّابِيَةً

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: faʿaṣaw rasūla rabbihim fa-akhadhahum akhdhatan rābiyatan
